description: Try our easy to follow Lemon Curd Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon Curd Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon lemon curd into a piping bag fitted with a 2cm star nozzle. Pipe onto half the biscuits. Top with remaining biscuits. Dust with icing sugar.
